Игра требует большего времени,чтобы научиться более-менее играть,вот казалось бы,ты знаешь все об этой игре,но начинаешь смотреть игру Astralis-liquid и ты понимаешь,что ты ничего не знаешь об этой игре

I liked everything about the game but the only thing I dislike is the internet advantage, the game is just basically about your location advantage and my location is in the middle east in the Arab countries and the closest people to me are Russians which gives me lack of communication and a lot of angry and toxic people with bad words, this game is literally unplayable with 100-150 ping and sometimes it says that i have around 60 ping but in reality i have about 300 ping spikes every second that the game cant detect the real ping.

F*ck this game.

With that said, I love this game.
